personal.name: Rajvardhan Tipugade
personal.title: Backend Developer & Problem Solver
personal.tagline: Crafting scalable systems, one optimized query at a time

about.summary: I'm a passionate Information Technology student at PICT Pune with a 9.02 CGPA, driven by a love for solving complex problems through code. With 500+ competitive programming challenges solved and hands-on experience building production-grade systems, I excel at transforming algorithmic thinking into scalable solutions.
about.experience: My recent internship at Bluestock allowed me to engineer a real-time cryptocurrency monitoring system, achieving sub-200ms WebSocket delivery and optimizing database performance by 30%. I combine technical expertise with leadership experience, having led backend development for multiple events at Pulzion while maintaining high code quality standards.
about.current: Currently exploring Java Full Stack development and always eager to tackle the next technical challenge that pushes the boundaries of what's possible.

experience.description: Built a production-ready cryptocurrency monitoring system from the ground up. Architected the backend with Node.js and Express, implementing WebSocket connections for instant price alerts across 50+ digital assets.
achievements: Reduced MongoDB query latency by 30% through strategic indexing
Achieved sub-200ms WebSocket delivery for real-time alerts

projects.description: High-performance real-time tracking platform with custom price alerts. Leverages WebSockets for instant notifications and optimized MongoDB queries.
highlights: Real-time tracker with user-defined price alerts
Reduced response latency by 30% through backend optimization
